Sentencas: A co-generation plant consisting of a solid oxide fuel cell, a supercritical carbon dioxide Brayton cycle, an organic Rankine cycle, and a domestic heat recovery was modeled based on the zero-dimensional approach.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: The minimization of Gibbs free energy and Lagrange method of undetermined multipliers were applied to find the unknown moles in the reactions.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: The effects of the current density, the fuel utilization ratio, and the anode recycle ratio were investigated on the plant performance.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: Net power, heated water and fuel flow rates, energy and exergy efficiencies, and CO2 emission were considered as outputs of the co-generation plant.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: The contributions of the parameters were determined using analysis of variance results and half-normal plot of the standardized effects.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: The regression models of the outputs were achieved with high credibility.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: The findings indicated that the current density had the highest contribution to plant performance.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: The multi-objective optimization showed that the current density of 7787.879 A/m(2) and the anode recycle ratio of 0.424 is the optimum condition.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization

Sentencas: In this state, the electrical exergy efficiency, the heated water flow rate, and the CO2 co-generation emission were 43.01%, 2769 gr/s, and 213.6 kg/(MW.h), respectively.
Titulo: Co-generation of electricity and heating using a SOFC-ScCO2 Brayton cycle-ORC integrated plant: Investigation and multi-objective optimization
